channel.title: Strain on butiran
channel.description: Recent content in Strain on butiran

item.title: strain in voigt notation
item.description: • Strain tensor can be transformed into that is an expression of symmetric tensor in lower order tensor.

item.title: strain tensor component
item.description: • For small displacement a strain tensor component where $u_a$ is displacement in $a$ direction and $x_b$ coordinate in $b$ direction, e.g. $u_1 \equiv u_x$ and $x_3 \equiv z$.

item.title: strain tensor
item.description:
• A 3D strain tensor where
    • $\varepsilon _{ab}$ ($a = b$) for normal strain,
    • $\varepsilon _{ab}$ ($a \ne b$) for shear strain.

item.title: equivalent strain
item.description: • It is a scalar representation of strain tensor and a straightforward variable reporting strain results over a body.
